availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Gabriella Power in Scott County, Kentucky, on December 6, 1852. Father of Ann Marion Barnett, John W. Barnett, James B. Barnett, and Martha D. Burnett. Farmer in Marion County, Illinois, in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Marion County, District 11, p. 69B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 965.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Lytles Fork, p. 284B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, Film 000183225, p. 118.
